Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, interior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents as western river [wine].
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393201) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393201)
